data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Anshun, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Anshun, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Anshun, Guizhou, China to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 26,703 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Anshun who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, remember the Liujia people. Make the Liujia people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Anshun words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 26,703 believers in Anshun, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Anshun, Guizhou, China has a population of 352,000.

We estimate Anshun has 26,703 people who might know Jesus, 5,687 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 319,610 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Anshun, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
